thread.title: Customer: Gary S.
thread.title_full: The Knife Merchant, Inc reviewed by Customer: Gary S.

author: Customer: Gary S.
title: Customer: Gary S.
text: David took the time to educate me on which knives would be well suited for my needs. He was very very thorough and I very much appreciated that. Then when it came time to order the pricing was right and I am thrilled with my purchase.
